hero.title: Built for Drivers Who Move India
hero.description: From trip planning to payments, every feature is designed to simplify your day and grow your earnings.

step1.title: 1. Login & Ready to Roll
step1.point1: Log in seamlessly using just your phone number and OTP validation.
step1.point2: Immediately access your dashboard to view critical stats like 'Active Trip', 'Earnings', and your current 'Rating'.
step1.point3: Use the 'Swipe right to start your journey' gesture to go online and signal you are ready for trips.

step2.title: 2. Build Your Profile, Build Trust
step2.point1: Verify your identity quickly by uploading your Driver’s License (DL) and Aadhar Card.
step2.point2: For vehicle owners, use the 'My Vehicle Fleet' section to register vehicles with RC, Permit, and Insurance certificates.
step2.point3: Complete your profile details to build trust and ensure you are matched with the correct cargo types.

step3.title: 3. New Trips, Fresh Opportunities
step3.point1: Receive real-time notifications for 'Available Trips' that specifically match your vehicle configuration.
step3.point2: Review detailed cargo specifics like 'Goods Type' (e.g., Electronics, Perishable), weight, and distance before accepting.
step3.point3: Check the ETA and Shipping Route preview in the trip listing to ensure the schedule fits your availability.

step4.title: 4. Negotiate & Secure the Deal
step4.point1: Don't settle for the first offer; submit your Counter Price or set a 'Final No Regret Price' to auto-negotiate.
step4.point2: Track the full negotiation history, including the customer's Initial Offer and any Revised Prices.
step4.point3: Once a bid is accepted, use your wallet balance to 'Pay to Start' (pay the booking fee) and officially secure the load.

step5.title: 5. Execution & Operations
step5.point1: Use the 'Secure Call' feature to contact the customer while keeping both phone numbers masked for privacy.
step5.point2: Navigate to the pickup location using the Trip Overview; the app tracks your distance to the loading point.
step5.point3: The 'Generate GR' (Goods Receipt) button is geo-locked and will only unlock once you physically reach the loading location.

step6.title: 6. Your Earnings, In Your Pocket
step6.point1: Track every rupee in your Wallet history, with clear records of 'Credited' earnings and 'Debited' fees.
step6.point2: Earn reward points for completed trips (e.g., 4 trips = 1 ticket) which can be redeemed for cash or vouchers like Flipkart.
step6.point3: Manage your liquidity instantly using the 'Withdraw' feature for bank transfers or 'Add Money' for trip fees.

step7.title: 7. Digital Documents Locker
step7.point1: Securely store digital copies of your RC, PUC, Fitness, and Permit certificates directly in the app.
step7.point2: Generate the digital Goods Receipt (GR) immediately upon loading the cargo.
step7.point3: Use the 'Share' feature to instantly send verified documents to shippers or authorities without physical paperwork.

hero.title: Built for Businesses That Ship with Confidence
hero.description: From posting loads to tracking deliveries, every feature is designed to give you control, transparency, and peace of mind.

step1.title: 1. Create Profile & Start Shipping
step1.point1: Onboard your business by verifying your GSTIN, PAN, and Company Name to ensure tax compliance.
step1.point2: Verify the authorized person's identity securely using their Aadhar Number.
step1.point3: Use the 'Add Representative' feature to allow multiple team members to manage shipments under one main account.

step2.title: 2. Your Profile, Your Control
step2.point1: Manage your business presence by keeping contact info and website details up to date.
step2.point2: Ensure your profile is verified to encourage high-rated vehicle owners to bid on your requests.
step2.point3: Control account security with secure logout options and session management.

step3.title: 3. Smart Cargo Configuration
step3.point1: Enter Source and Destination pincodes to receive accurate route planning and vehicle matching.
step3.point2: Input cargo details; the app automatically flags shipments as ODC (Over Dimensional) or OWC (Over Weight) if they exceed limits.
step3.point3: Choose to 'Start Bidding' to invite competitive offers from drivers rather than sticking to a fixed price.

step4.title: 4. Keep Every Trip on Track
step4.point1: Monitor shipments with real-time status updates like 'In Progress', 'Completed', or 'Canceled'.
step4.point2: Track the driver's live distance to the loading point to manage your supply chain timing.
step4.point3: Receive immediate confirmation when the driver reaches the location and generates the digital Goods Receipt (GR).

step5.title: 5. Wallet & Secure Payments
step5.point1: Process payments securely via the integrated payment gateway.
step5.point2: Use 'Add Money' to top up your wallet for bidding fees and view detailed transaction histories.
step5.point3: Earn rewards or discounts (e.g., 10% OFF on your next ride) for frequent shipping activities.
